card.name: Archangel's Light
card.property: You gain 2 life for each card in your graveyard, then shuffle your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Bar the Door
card.property: Creatures you control get +0/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Break of Day
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Fateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

card.name: Burden of Guilt
card.property: Enchant creature {1}: Tap enchanted creature.

card.name: Curse of Exhaustion
card.property: Enchant player Enchanted player can't cast more than one spell each turn.

card.name: Elgaud Inquisitor

card.name: Faith's Shield
card.property: Target permanent you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Fateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, instead you and each permanent you control gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Gather the Townsfolk
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens. Fateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, create five of those tokens instead.

card.name: Gavony Ironwright
card.property: Fateful hour — As long as you have 5 or less life, other creatures you control get +1/+4.

card.name: Hollowhenge Spirit

card.name: Increasing Devotion
